record.title: COMMENDING THE ACHIEVEMENTS OF THE RUTGERS UNIVERSITY WOMEN'S BASKETBALL TEAM
record.chair: The unfinished business is the vote on the motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, H. Res. 300, on which the yeas and nays were ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: The question is on the motion offered by the gentleman from New Jersey (Mr. Payne) that the House suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, H. Res. 300.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 226, I was talking with the Taiwanese Delegation and missed the vote. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 226, had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
